name: Shield the Banner
text: This spell is used to protect one of a tribe’s most valuable possessions: its tribal banner. Any creature (other than a member of the tribe which the standard represents) attempting to directly attack or touch the standard must make a Will save. This spell functions as sanctuary, but only protects a standard or banner. In addition, the spell grants a +2 bonus to the standard’s hardness, and +10 to the standard’s hit points for the duration of the spell.
text_zh:
此法术被用来保护一个部落中最有价值的财富：他们部落的旗帜。任何生物(除了这面旗子所代表的部落的成员外)想要直接攻击或触碰这面旗子必须过一个意志豁免检定。此法术如同圣域术(sanctuary)般作用，除了它仅能保护一面旗子或一面旗帜。此外，此法术在持续时间内，给与该面旗子在硬度上+2的加值，以及+10点的生命值。

◎献祭译文大部分援引自格里菲因于 [扩展]术士/法师扩展法术翻译之法术翻译。
